originalText.text: This company is a fraud, posing as a property manager. The domain resolves (registered 9 months ago) to a place in Jacksonville, FL. Don't give them your $50 for an application, you will get nowhere.

text.text: This company is a fraud, posing as a property manager. The domain resolves (registered 9 months ago) to a place in Jacksonville, FL. Don't give them your $50 for an application, you will get nowhere.

originalText.text: Have been an Actlien tenant for almost 4 years.  Once we retired we did not want the work and expense of maintaining our own home. We happened into a lovely home newly renovated in a nice neighborhood.  Over the years I've heard horror stories about landlord's. That is not the case with Actlien.  Any issues that have come up that needed maintenance they were on it right away.  They have always been there whenever needed, but not overbearing either. Would recommend them with a 5*+. Sandy C
